allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add POST /v1/state/sync endpoint for scheduling landscape hydration

Implements the state sync module that accepts a full scheduling payload
\(horizon, resources, tasks, state changes, scoring, settings\), transforms
DTOs into engine objects, builds a SchedulingLandscape, and stores it
keyed by tenant ID. Also enables engine compilation with composite project
references and fixes pre-existing build issues \(ES2022 target, duplicate
export, empty module\).

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
